oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Rodeo Review - 1947-08-23
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: KVOO, Tulsa, OK radio program Rodeo Review, originally broadcast 1947-08-23. Featuring announcer Walter Teas, with host Bill Hoge reading news about round-up club activities in the Southwest.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:creator: Foy Willing; Riders Of The Purple Sage
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dcterms:tableOfContents: Theme (Ridin' Down To Santa Fe) -- Opening statement (Walter Teas) -- Bill Hoge reads round-up news -- Oklahoma Hills (Foy Willing and the Riders Of The Purple Sage) (recording) -- Bill Hoge reads round-up news -- Closing statement (Bill Hoge) -- Theme (Ridin' Down To Santa Fe) -- Closing statement (Walter Teas)
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: KVOO (Radio station : Tulsa, Okla.); Rodeo review (Radio program); Teas, Walter; Hoge, Bill
